title: 193: So Your Parents are Thinking of Sending You to a Classical Christian School
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Josh Gibbs decided to write a pamphlet to kids trembling at the notion of going to a classical school. We, clearly a bunch of children, decided to read it.
itunes:author: I wouldn't send MY kids. Think of the homework!
itunes:subtitle: For children!
itunes:summary: Josh Gibbs decided to write a pamphlet to kids trembling at the notion of going to a classical school. We, clearly a bunch of children, decided to read it.
